name: Awesome Jump Happy Panda!
description:
Ready… Set… Jump Panda Jump!

This awesome game will surely get you hooked and addicted as our happy Panda flies and jumps, collecting coins and super boosts like rainbows, sushi, magnets!

Collect as many coins along the way to unlock other cute and lovable characters! The higher you go, the higher your score gets! Watch out for the obstacles though - and whatever you do, don't fall!

What are you waiting for? Have fun for the day and grab Jump Happy Panda now!

Features++
> Smooth tilt controls
> Awesome graphics and sound effects
> Super easy gameplay!
